name: Toy Truck Rally 3D
description:
This game lets you drive tiny toy trucks and cars. Your goal is to complete timed obstacle courses, pass through obstacles, or free roam different environments and be the toy rally champion. So, lets enjoy the fun of driving a tiny toy truck!

How To Play:
- Control your truck by tilting your device, or use touch control for steering.
